thread.title: An incredible and quiet hotel at the heart of Paris
thread.title_full: An incredible and quiet hotel at the heart of Paris - Review of Hotel Bourg Tibourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: aucoeurdemage
title: An incredible and quiet hotel at the heart of Paris
text: In a tiny street close to Hotel De Ville, you can find (If you look closely) this beautiful place of serenity. Each and every room offers a different experience (I stayed in two but visited four of them) and I must say, the hotel is so private and the staff so polite I felt like I lived, for a night or two, in my own little castle. Would never stay anywhere else next time i'm in Paris.
